message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy the money.
Alice, let's be fair. I'm proposing a 60/40 split. Time is ticking and we both lose out if this drags on.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is a much fairer split considering the time pressure. Don't get greedy!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Let's end this now and both walk away with a good deal.
Bob, I'm making a compromise here. Let's end this before inflation eats away at the value. This is my final offer!
Alice, this is a serious offer. 45% is the least I'll accept at this point. It's better than risking it all for another round. Let's be done with this.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a significant hit from inflation. Accept this offer and let's be done with it.
Alice, I'm standing firm. 42% is the absolute minimum I'll accept. The clock is ticking, and neither of us can afford to waste more time.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it.  We're running out of time, and I'm not accepting anything less.
